systemDescription: The Dashboard should highlight correlations and dependencies between features, and cluster similar datapoints (patients). It is built of 3 visual areas, a heatmap, Toggle of scatterplot or histogram, and PCA biplot.

interactions.checkbox: Select Features to display in heatmap
interactions.click non-diagonal cell: shows and updates scatterplot with selected feature pair
interactions.click diagonal cell: shows and updates histogram with selected feature

views.Display condition: Toggle with histogram, displayed if non-diagonal heatmap cell is selected

options: Test method of Y-axis feature (available only for z-scores)

views.Display condition: Toggle with scatterplot, displayed if diagonal heatmap cell is clicked

options: Test method of Y-axis feature (available only for z-scores)

interactions.button: Run PCA and apply k-means clustering

viewRelationships.description: Selecting a non-diagonal heatmap cell sets the X and Y features in the scatterplot.
Selecting a diagonal heatmap cell sets the X feature for the histogram.
